name: EverQuest Online Adventures: Frontiers
synopsis: The second edition of [[EverQuest Online Adventures]] allows you to team up with people from around the world to fight monsters, complete challenging quests, and explore dangerous and spectacular locales. EverQuest Online Adventures: Frontiers introduces a new playable class, the alchemist, in which you can become a master of powerful spells and abilities. You'll gain access to all-new uncharted territories to explore, new items and spells to acquire, fierce creatures to battle, and a new character race to play, the Ogre.
